name: Maze of Memories (itch) (kingdomfantasy6, Dori)
description:
Journey through a maze of memories using WASD controls.

Go on a spiritual journey and grow through exploring  the depths of your memories while learning the trials of life. 

CREDITS:

Olivia Wertheimer - Producer, Programmer, Lighting Artist 

Caroline Selber - Level Design, Narrative Design 

Maève Levasseur - Character Artist, Items and Materials Artist
